# default values
set maximumIntegerDigits 2000000000
set useSignificantDigits N
set useExponentialNotation N
set exponentSignAlwaysShown N
set groupingUsed N
set decimalSeparatorAlwaysShown N
set roundingIncrementUsed N
set negPatternsBogus N
set posPatternsBogus N

set negSuffixPattern

save defaults

** test: Fixed Decimal
merge defaults
set minimumIntegerDigits 1
set minimumFractionDigits 2
set maximumFractionDigits 2
verify 0.00

** test: Variable Decimal
merge defaults
set minimumIntegerDigits 1
set minimumFractionDigits 2
set maximumFractionDigits 4
verify 0.00##

** test: Grouping
merge defaults
set minimumIntegerDigits 4
set groupingUsed Y
set groupingSize 6
set groupingSize2 0
set minimumFractionDigits 0
set maximumFractionDigits 1
verify #,##0000.#

** test: Grouping2

** test: Padding
